title: Mixed Learning-Based Science Writing Skill Transfer Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Science Knowledge, Limited Writing Experience
context.additional_context: Development of scientific writing skills to enhance job relevance for professionals

learning_goals: Learners can restructure scientific facts into logically structured written formats with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can effectively provide peer feedback on scientific writing to colleagues at least three times through peer review processes.
Learners can apply at least two writing skills acquired in blended learning environments to real-world business reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
